body.p: For many investees, a range of operating and financing activities significantly affect their returns. Examples of activities that, depending on the circumstances, can be relevant activities include, but are not limited to:

li.p: selling and purchasing of goods or services;
managing financial assets during their life (including upon default);
selecting, acquiring or disposing of assets;
researching and developing new products or processes; and
determining a funding structure or obtaining funding.
